segments.text: Let me take care of the check today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why ? It's unfair . How about going dutch ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You paid the last time , because I didn't have any money , remember ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , come on , I almost forgot . Don't worry about it . I didn't mind picking up the tab last time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But you really should let me treat one time , I feel like I own you one if I didn't .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , but it's only for this time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's 12 dollars 80 cents all together . But don't forget the tip , it usually 15 % .
segments.speaker: S2
